arts.ttl: “We have to fight for everything we can” - David Moyes still searching for his first win at Anfield
arts.sum: David Moyes has failed to win any of his 22 previous matches at Anfield with Everton, Manchester United, Sunderland and West Ham United.

“Let’s see…”: Liverpool ace starting against Everton in doubt as Slot plays waiting game
arts.sum: Liverpool take on Everton in the Merseyside Derby tomorrow, and they will look to continue their winning start to the campaign. They have picked up four wins in a row in the Premier League, and they will look to pick up their fifth win tomorrow. arts.ttl: November Premier League fixtures shift for TV coverage, UEFA duties, and midweek drama

arts.ttl: Branthwaite, Mykolenko Everton injury update provided by Moyes before Liverpool trip
arts.sum: Everton manager David Moyes provides a fresh update on the fitness of Jarrad Branthwaite and Vitaliy Mykolenko ahead of the 247th Merseyside derby away against Liverpool in the Premier League on Saturday lunchtime.
